content: practice those half_double_crochet stitches and make yourself a hat at the same time with this beginner half_double_crochet hat -------------------------- you will receive -------------------------- 1 pdf digital download file for beginner half_double_crochet hat crochet pattern instant download as soon as payment clears ravelry s system written in english and u s crochet terms ---------------- yarn used ---------------- worsted weight yarn #4 ---------- sizes ---------- size head circumference baby 14-16 36-40cm toddler 16-18 41-46cm child 18-20 46-51cm small adult 21-22 53-56cm large adult 23-24 58 5-61cm ----------------- skill level ----------------- beginner ---------- notes ---------- ~gauge is included in this pattern ~this pattern has been checked for accuracy although this has been tested please note that small errors can still slip by i am happy to assist if you need any help ~this is a free pattern on my blog but you can also purchase this listing for the ad-free downloadable pdf version ----------------------- downloading ----------------------- ~download instructions~ go to my notebook and find the pattern image for this purchase and a download link will accompany it i cannot email patterns to you ------------------------ where to print ------------------------ ~ home printer ~ local copy store -
